cards.name: Abolish
cards.text:
You may discard a Plains card rather than pay Abolish's mana cost.
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
cards.flavor: As war raged on, the young mages became more direct in their tactics, often at great cost.

cards.name: Æther Spellbomb
cards.text:
{U}, Sacrifice Æther Spellbomb: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
{1}, Sacrifice Æther Spellbomb: Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"Release that which was never caged."
—Spellbomb inscription

cards.name: Angel of Salvation
cards.text:
Flash; convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Flying
When Angel of Salvation enters the battlefield, prevent the next 5 damage that would be dealt this turn to any number of target creatures and/or players, divided as you choose.

cards.name: Arcbound Worker
cards.text: Modular 1 (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)
cards.flavor: The parts are as strong as the whole.

cards.name: Argivian Restoration
cards.text: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
"The Argivian University taught me two things: always look to the past, and never dismiss what appears useless."
—Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

cards.name: Assembly-Worker
cards.text: {T}: Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: With their factories long destroyed, some of Mishra's creations still toil in remote areas, endlessly performing and reperforming their last orders.

cards.name: Blinding Beam
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Tap two target creatures.
• Creatures don't untap during target player's next untap step.
Entwine {1} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

cards.name: Burrenton Bombardier
cards.text:
Flying
Reinforce 2—{2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.)
cards.flavor: The flasks provide ballast, a means of steering, and—with a little luck—a way to deliver ward-spells to cohorts below.

cards.name: Catapult Master
cards.text: Tap five untapped Soldiers you control: Exile target creature.
cards.flavor: "There's no ‘I' in ‘team,' but there's a ‘we' in ‘weapon.'"

cards.name: Celestial Crusader
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Flying
Other white creatures get +1/+1.

cards.name: Clockwork Condor
cards.text:
Flying
Clockwork Condor enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever Clockwork Condor attacks or blocks, remove a +1/+1 counter from it at end of combat.

cards.name: Clockwork Hydra
cards.text:
Clockwork Hydra enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever Clockwork Hydra attacks or blocks, remove a +1/+1 counter from it. If you do, Clockwork Hydra deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Clockwork Hydra.

cards.name: Conclave Equenaut
cards.text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Flying
cards.flavor: Equenauts are the seeds of the Conclave, scattered on the four winds, searching for new places to take root.

cards.name: Conclave Phalanx
cards.text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
When Conclave Phalanx enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.

cards.name: Contagion Clasp
cards.text:
When Contagion Clasp enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
{4}, {T}: Proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

cards.name: Crusade
cards.text: White creatures get +1/+1.
cards.flavor:
"Finally, I understand. Home isn't where you rest. It's what you fight for."
—Elspeth Tirel

cards.name: Darksteel Citadel
cards.text:
Indestructible (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy this land.)
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Panopticon, forge of the Darksteel Eye, home of Mirrodin's keeper.

cards.name: Daru Encampment
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{W}, {T}: Target Soldier creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Echoing Truth
cards.text: Return target nonland permanent and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent to their owners' hands.
cards.flavor: A single lie unleashes a tide of disbelief.

cards.name: Elite Vanguard
cards.flavor: The vanguard is skilled at waging war alone. The enemy is often defeated before its reinforcements reach the front.

cards.name: Elixir of Immortality
cards.text: {2}, {T}: You gain 5 life. Shuffle Elixir of Immortality and your graveyard into their owner's library.
cards.flavor:
"Bottled life. Not as tasty as I'm used to, rather stale, but it has the same effect."
—Baron Sengir

cards.name: Elspeth, Knight-Errant
cards.text:
+1: Put a 1/1 white Soldier creature token onto the battlefield.
+1: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn.
−8: You get an emblem with "Artifacts, creatures, enchantments, and lands you control have indestructible."

cards.name: Energy Chamber
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on target artifact creature.
• Put a charge counter on target noncreature artifact.

cards.name: Esperzoa
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, return an artifact you control to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: The more metal it digests, the more its jelly will fetch on the alchemists' market.

cards.name: Everflowing Chalice
cards.text:
Multikicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Everflowing Chalice enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each time it was kicked.
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool for each charge counter on Everflowing Chalice.

cards.name: Faerie Mechanist
cards.text:
Flying
When Faerie Mechanist enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Foil
cards.text:
You may discard an Island card and another card rather than pay Foil's mana cost.
Counter target spell.

cards.name: Frogmite
cards.text: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
cards.flavor: At first, vedalken observers thought blinkmoths naturally avoided certain places. Then they realized those places were frogmite feeding grounds.

cards.name: Glory Seeker
cards.flavor: "There's no contract to sign, no oath to swear. The enlistment procedure is to unsheathe your sword and point it at the enemy."

cards.name: Goldmeadow Harrier
cards.text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
cards.flavor:
"It's a proven fact that sling-stones from the dawn side of the riverbank sail the farthest and truest."
—Deagan, cenn of Burrenton

cards.name: Infantry Veteran
cards.text: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "Any fool can pick up a sword and charge into battle. To emerge alive at the end, that is a gift that comes from leadership and experience."

cards.name: Journey to Nowhere
cards.text:
When Journey to Nowhere enters the battlefield, exile target creature.
When Journey to Nowhere leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

cards.name: Juggernaut
cards.text:
Juggernaut attacks each turn if able.
Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls.
cards.flavor: The mighty city of An Karras, with its rich history, built over thousands of years, fell in three hours.

cards.name: Kabira Crossroads
cards.text:
Kabira Crossroads enters the battlefield tapped.
When Kabira Crossroads enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Kemba's Skyguard
cards.text:
Flying
When Kemba's Skyguard enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
cards.flavor:
"We're now to dispense aid to any Mirran we see battling anything . . . ‘strange.' Regent's orders."
—Ranya, skyhunter captain

cards.name: Kor Aeronaut
cards.text:
Kicker {1}{W} (You may pay an additional {1}{W} as you cast this spell.)
Flying
When Kor Aeronaut enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, target creature gains flying until end of turn.

cards.name: Kor Hookmaster
cards.text: When Kor Hookmaster enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
cards.flavor: "For us, a rope represents the ties that bind the kor. For you, it's more literal."

cards.name: Kor Skyfisher
cards.text:
Flying
When Kor Skyfisher enters the battlefield, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: "Sometimes I snare the unexpected, but I know its purpose will be revealed in time."

cards.name: Loyal Sentry
cards.text: When Loyal Sentry blocks a creature, destroy that creature and Loyal Sentry.
cards.flavor: "My cause is simple: To stop you, at any cost, from ever seeing the inside of this keep."

cards.name: Master of Etherium
cards.text:
Master of Etherium's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control.
Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.
cards.flavor: "Only a mind unfettered with the concerns of the flesh can see the world as it truly is."

cards.name: Mighty Leap
cards.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"The southern fortress taken by invaders? Heh, sure . . . when elephants fly."
—Brezard Skeinbow, captain of the guard

cards.name: Mishra's Factory
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}: Mishra's Factory becomes a 2/2 Assembly-Worker artifact creature until end of turn. It's still a land.
{T}: Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Moonglove Extract
cards.text: Sacrifice Moonglove Extract: Moonglove Extract deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: Diluted, moonglove can etch living tissue. Concentrated, a drop will kill a giant.

cards.name: Mosquito Guard
cards.text:
First strike
Reinforce 1—{1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.)
cards.flavor: His aim is as sure as a mosquito's sting, but with none of the warning.

cards.name: Pentavus
cards.text:
Pentavus enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Pentavus: Put a 1/1 colorless Pentavite artifact creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
{1}, Sacrifice a Pentavite: Put a +1/+1 counter on Pentavus.

cards.name: Qumulox
cards.text:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
Flying
cards.flavor: Even the clouds bend themselves to Memnarch's will, eager to swallow those who oppose him.

cards.name: Raise the Alarm
cards.text: Put two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: "The nim raid our homes without warning. We must defend our homes without hesitation."

cards.name: Razor Barrier
cards.text: Target permanent you control gains protection from artifacts or from the color of your choice until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "We protect our homelands. Why should they not protect us?"

cards.name: Razormane Masticore
cards.text:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Razormane Masticore unless you discard a card.
At the beginning of your draw step, you may have Razormane Masticore deal 3 damage to target creature.

cards.name: Runed Servitor
cards.text: When Runed Servitor dies, each player draws a card.
cards.flavor: Scholars had puzzled for centuries over the ruins at Tal Terig. Its secrets had always lived within one rune-carved head.

cards.name: Rustic Clachan
cards.text:
As Rustic Clachan enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Kithkin card from your hand. If you don't, Rustic Clachan enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.
Reinforce 1—{1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.)

cards.name: Saltblast
cards.text: Destroy target nonwhite permanent.
cards.flavor: Dominaria erodes with each passing gust.

cards.name: Seasoned Marshal
cards.text: Whenever Seasoned Marshal attacks, you may tap target creature.
cards.flavor: There are only two rules of tactics: never be without a plan, and never rely on it.

cards.name: Seat of the Synod
cards.text:
(Seat of the Synod isn't a spell.)
{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Lumengrid, site of the Knowledge Pool, source of vedalken arcana.

cards.name: Serrated Biskelion
cards.text: {T}: Put a -1/-1 counter on Serrated Biskelion and a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
cards.flavor:
"Whereas I was created to protect, the biskelion was created to destroy."
—Karn, silver golem

cards.name: Silver Myr
cards.text: {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: The vedalken saw the myr as toys, unaware of the intelligence lurking behind their empty eyes.

cards.name: Stalking Stones
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{6}: Stalking Stones becomes a 3/3 Elemental artifact creature that's still a land. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

cards.name: Steel Overseer
cards.text: {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each artifact creature you control.
cards.flavor:
"The world is already run by all manner of machines. One day, they'll remind us of that fact."
—Sargis Haz, artificer

cards.name: Steel Wall
cards.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
cards.flavor:
"We sculpt the land into what we need—homes, armament, fortresses of war. Our strength comes not only from knowing, but from commanding the terrain."
—Raksha Golden Cub, leonin kha

cards.name: Stormfront Riders
cards.text:
Flying
When Stormfront Riders enters the battlefield, return two creatures you control to their owner's hand.
Whenever Stormfront Riders or another creature is returned to your hand from the battlefield, put a 1/1 white Soldier creature token onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Sunlance
cards.text: Sunlance deals 3 damage to target nonwhite creature.
cards.flavor:
"It's easy for the innocent to speak of justice. They seldom feel its terrible power."
—Orim, Samite inquisitor

cards.name: Swell of Courage
cards.text:
Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
Reinforce X—{X}{W}{W} ({X}{W}{W}, Discard this card: Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature.)
cards.flavor:
"Tideshaping is more than creating a few
new puddles."

cards.name: Swords to Plowshares
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
cards.flavor: The smallest seed of regret can bloom into redemption.

cards.name: Synod Centurion
cards.text: When you control no other artifacts, sacrifice Synod Centurion.
cards.flavor:
"We order them to stand, they stand. We order them to wait, they wait. We order them to die, they die."
—Pontifex, elder researcher

cards.name: Temple Acolyte
cards.text: When Temple Acolyte enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
cards.flavor: Young, yes. Inexperienced, yes. Weak? Don't count on it.

cards.name: Tezzeret the Seeker
cards.text:
+1: Untap up to two target artifacts.
−X: Search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost X or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
−5: Artifacts you control become artifact creatures with base power and toughness 5/5 until end of turn.

cards.name: Thirst for Knowledge
cards.text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.
cards.flavor: "To truly know something, you must become it. The trick is to not lose yourself in the process."

cards.name: Thoughtcast
cards.text:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
Draw two cards.
cards.flavor: Vedalken eyes don't see the beauty in things. They see only what those things can teach.

cards.name: Trinket Mage
cards.text: When Trinket Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

cards.name: Trip Noose
cards.text: {2}, {T}: Tap target creature.
cards.flavor: A taut slipknot trigger is the only thing standing between you and standing.

cards.name: Triskelion
cards.text:
Triskelion enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.
Remove a +1/+1 counter from Triskelion: Triskelion deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor:
"Why do bad things always come in threes?"
—Gisulf, expedition survivor
